Title: Argentina’s IEASA seeks nine May-June LNG cargoes for Bahia Blanca, Escobar
Description: Argentina’s state-owned energy firm IEASA is seeking a total of nine cargoes for delivery across May and June to its 6.1 mtpa Escobar and 3.7 mtpa Bahia Blanca LNG receiving terminals through a tender that closes on Mar. 29. IEASA will announce the tender results the following day.
Author: CK
